title: Chibi Neko Tomu no Daibouken: Chikyuu wo Sukue! Nakama-tachi
synopsis: Anime adaptation of children's stories "The Adventures of Tom the small Cat" by Masumi Lino (飯野真澄) (Story) and Yumiko Imai (今井弓子) (Illustrations).
staff: [['Nakamura, Ryuutarou', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Series Composition']], ['Shiba, Shigeharu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawai, Kenji', ['Music']], ['Okiura, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
